00074 // Compute degrees of freedom from specific heat Cp:
00075 #define DOFK    3 // Kinetic degrees of freedom = 3
00076 //#define DOF(cp)       MAX((cp)*GasConstantInv+0.5,DOFK) //= 3 + (2(Cp/R-1)-3)/2 = 3 + Cp/R -1 - 1.5 = Cp/R + 1.5 - 1 = Cp/R + 0.5
